page.title: 03Medical Services.
page.content: In Bernera we have our own district nurse who lives in the community.The nurse's cottage is right next to the surgery so that if there is an emergency she isn't too far away. When the nurse is on holiday or has days off, a relief nurse comes in her place. The surgery is centrally placed so that it is easy to reach. The doctor lives in Uig which is 23 miles away. He comes to Bernera twice a week, on Tuesdays and on Fridays.Our Doctor makes some of his own medicines and he buys the rest at the suppliers in Stornoway which is 26 miles away. When the doctor comes to Bernera he does house calls in the morning and has surgery in the afternoon.
